note: Minimal, citeable reference table (CODATA + Planck 2018 base-ΛCDM). Use this as a stable external-data anchor for TFPT modules.

alpha_inv_codata_2022.definition: inverse fine-structure constant α^{-1}(0) in the Thomson limit
alpha_inv_codata_2022.source: NIST CODATA 2022: inverse fine-structure constant α^{-1}=137.035999177(21) (`https://physics.nist.gov/cgi-bin/cuu/Value?alphinv`)

alpha_bar5_inv_MZ.definition: inverse electromagnetic coupling ᾱ^{(5)}(MZ)^{-1} (secondary check; derived from α(0) via Δα)
alpha_bar5_inv_MZ.source: PDG 2024 electroweak review: α̂^{(5)}(MZ)^{-1} = 127.930 ± 0.008 (MSbar; see tfpt_suite/data/alpha_running_pdg.json).

omega_b_h2_planck2018.source: Planck 2018 results VI (2020), base-ΛCDM TT,TE,EE+lowE+lensing: Ω_b h^2 = 0.02237 ± 0.00015 (Table 2) (`https://arxiv.org/abs/1807.06209`)

H0_planck2018_km_s_Mpc.source: Planck 2018 results VI (2020), base-ΛCDM TT,TE,EE+lowE+lensing: H0 = 67.36 ± 0.54 (Table 2) (`https://arxiv.org/abs/1807.06209`)

n_s_planck2018.source: Planck 2018 results VI (2020), base-ΛCDM TT,TE,EE+lowE+lensing: n_s = 0.9649 ± 0.0042 (Table 2) (`https://arxiv.org/abs/1807.06209`)

ln10_As_planck2018.source: Planck 2018 results VI (2020), base-ΛCDM TT,TE,EE+lowE+lensing: ln(10^{10} A_s) = 3.044 ± 0.014 (Table 2) (`https://arxiv.org/abs/1807.06209`)
